title: how can you not press r?
body: my team's zad alst game. literally had to press r on a knocked up vayne to win the game. doesnt do it until she ults and goes invis afterward. i lvoe league of legends :)

Im betting he may be. Lonely and shitfaced
thanks, i try my best, my keyboard dyslexia got the better of me in my passion for the game.
